DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy Urine Protein Creatinine Assessment Ind-3b
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicab related to pretreatment assessment of the any of a group of complex organic macromolecules that contain carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, nitrogen, and usually sulfur and are composed of one or more chains of amino acids in the fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Therapy Urine Protein Creatinine Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to pretreatment assessment of the any of a group of complex organic macromolecules that contain carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, nitrogen, and usually sulfur and are composed of one or more chains of amino acids in the fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.:Any of a group of complex organic macromolecules that contain carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, nitrogen, and usually sulfur and are composed of one or more chains of amino acids. Proteins are fundamental components of all living cells and include many substances, such as enzymes, hormones, and antibodies, that are necessary for the proper functioning of an organism.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.

A group of complex organic macromolecules composed of one or more chains (linear polymers) of alpha-L-amino acids linked by peptide bonds and ranging in size from a few thousand to over 1 million Daltons. Proteins are fundamental genetically encoded components of living cells with specific structures and functions dictated by amino acid sequence.

Property.preferredDefinition: The breakdown product of creatine, a constituent of muscle tissue, that is excreted by the kidney and whose serum level is used to evaluate kidney function.(NCI):The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The breakdown product of creatine, a constituent of muscle tissue, that is excreted by the kidney and whose serum level is used to evaluate kidney function.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
